selectContact(String, Tab[], Tab, Theme) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The selectContact() opens an Activity that displays the authenticated users Contacts to select.
setAutoConnectChannels(boolean) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setAutoConnectChannels() method determines if channels should be automatically connected to.
setAutoRun(boolean) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setAutoRun() method determines if the app should be launched on the start of the OS or not.
setExternalId(String) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setExternalId() method sets an external id for messages to filter though.
setMode(AudioMode) - Method in class com.zello.sdk.Audio
The setMode() method sets the current AudioMode to the passed in mode.
setSelectedChannelOrGroup(String) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setSelectedChannelOrGroup() method sets the selected contact to a specified Channel or Group.
setSelectedContact(Contact) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setSelectedContact() method sets the selected contact to a specified Contact.
setSelectedUserOrGateway(String) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setSelectedUserOrGateway() method sets the selected contact to a specified User or Gateway.
setStatus(Status) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setStatus() method sets the status of the authenticated user to a Status message.
setStatusMessage(String) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The setStatusMessage() method sets the status of the authenticated user to a custom message.
setWearableMode(int) - Method in class com.zello.sdk.Audio
The setWearableMode() method sets the current AudioMode to the WEARABLE mode using the passed in wearable index.
signIn(String, String, String) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The signIn() method authenticates the user on the network with the passed in login credentials.
signIn(String, String, String, boolean) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The signIn() method authenticates the user on the network with the passed in login credentials with an option for the authentication to perish.
signOut() - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The signOut() method unauthenticates the user from the network.
State - Enum in com.zello.sdk
The State enum represents the authentication state of the user.
Status - Enum in com.zello.sdk
The Status enum represents the status of a Contact.
subscribeToEvents(Events) - Static method in class com.zello.sdk.Zello
The subscribeToEvents() method ensures the passed in Events implementor will receive Events method invocations.
